roleset.name: to attack the character or reputation of someone who is not present
roleset.note: BACKBITE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'backbite' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 33.frame by Perryn (from backbite.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: We're backbiting each other over tiny plots of land and you look at all these unused fields.
